A8: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(4″-chlorophenyl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethyl)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 90%; m.p. 68 °C; R
f = 0.72 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1656 (C=O), 1609 (C=C Ar), 1505 (CH=CH), 1247 (-CF 3), 3001 (Ar C-H stretching), 841 (C-Cl); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: 7.78 (1H, d, J = 16.3 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.14 (1H, d, J = 16.2 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.77–8.13 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.43–7.61 (4H, m, C-2″, 4″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 311.62 [M + H] +.
